remarks: The scalar field of a complex pre-Hilbert space is closed under square roots of positive reals (i.e. it is quadratically closed relative to ` RR ` ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphsca.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphsqrtcl $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) ) -> ( sqrt ` A ) e. K ) $.
